duties_responsibilities.duty: Research and develop detailed public involvement plans, stakeholder engagement plans, and public outreach strategy documents while ensuring compliance with state and federal Environmental Justice policy.
Develop marketing, design, and communication materials on behalf of clients.
Organize and host virtual events with a large group of people using Zoom, Teams, or similar virtual platforms.
Perform content development, editorial review, and final production of communication materials.
Manage social media, content development, and strategy.
Participate in project planning and scheduling.
Develop and maintain detailed stakeholder contact databases.
Attend client and team meetings, issue agendas and minutes.
Provide support to clients and other team members and help meet deadlines for internal and external deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Communications, Public Relations, Political Science, or equivalent professional experience
